config.sonic_road module¶

config.sonic_road.add_config_dict(base_dict, dict_to_add)[source]¶

Adds a dictionary to base one. The parameters are added to the base dict.

Parameters:
  • base_dict – (dict) base dict
  • dict_to_add – (dict) dict to add
Returns:

(dict) a resulting dictionary that is made with the following rules
config.sonic_road.category_from_now_sunset_sunrise_time(now_time, sunrise_time, sunset_time)[source]¶

Get category (among night, afternoon, morning, sunset, sunrise) based on sunset, sunrise and now time.

Parameters:
  • now_time – (datetime) local time in str ex : 2019-02-06T07:13:15+00:00
  • sunrise_time – (datetime) local sunrise time in str ex : 2019-02-06T07:13:15+00:00
  • sunset_time – (datetime) local sunset time in str ex : 2019-02-06T07:13:15+00:00
Returns:

(str) night, afternoon, morning, sunset or sunrise
config.sonic_road.get_dict_config(config_filepath, schema)[source]¶

Parse the csv file to get a correct config file in python dict type.

Parameters:config_filepath – (str) the filepath to the meta rule python dict
Returns:(dict) python config file dictionary
config.sonic_road.min_tempo_from_speed(speed)[source]¶

Get min_tempo from speed.

Parameters:speed – (float) speed of the car
Returns:(float) the min_tempo deducted
config.sonic_road.sigmoid_from_speed(speed, min, max, neutral_speed)[source]¶

This is the energy function based on speed (the smooth coeff 0.1 is for now fixed).

Parameters:
  • speed – (float) speed from the api
  • min – (float) the - inf asymptote of the sigmoid
  • max – (float) the + inf asymptote of the sigmoid
  • neutral_speed – (float) the offset put to the function to get 0 energy at this speed
Returns:

(float) the deducted energy from the speed based on laurent expertise
